dogs.review: Laura takes good care of me and lets me sleep on her bed and I have lots of fun playing with Lila. Going to Laura's house to stay is my favourite!
Staying with Laura and Lila is the best! I love playing with Lila and running with her in the fields near her house, it's like being at home with my family but better.
Whether I stay overnight or for the day, Laura's house is always special. Lila and I get up to mischief sometimes but Laura says she misses me when I'm not around.
Lila and I have such an amazing time together, staying at Laura's is like a home from home!
Laura's house has lots of places for me to snuggle down and get comfortable, and she even lets me sleep on her bed if I've been a good boy.
Laura's house is near my favourite woods where there are lots of squirrels to chase and sticks to find. It's great getting to stay there when my mum is away.
